document_data.Relationships: He was a guard for [[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan and often worked on tasks together with [[Sarlor]] and [[Tarth]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|119-120|8}}
document_data.History: Mulgar was a guard for Orthil Voldovan's caravan in the {{yearlinkName|1357}}, when it was joined by [[Shandril Shessair]] and [[Narm Tamaraith]]. During the ride from [[Scornubel]] to [[Triel]], he was briefly assigned to quiet a horse somehow or else kill it, with Tarth's help. He was also assigned briefly to keep watch on Shandril, where he had a quick outburst after she threatened to kill them for keeping her away from Narm after a bandit raid injured him. He helped cool the situation afterwards.
